95451849-0a4e-4133-9fe0-97e88c613787.title: Plank
directions: Start in a push-up position with your hands directly under your shoulders
Engage your core muscles and maintain a straight line from your head to your heels
Hold this position for as long as you can, aiming for 30 seconds to 1 minute

95451849-0a4e-4133-9fe0-97e88c613787.title: Russian Twists
directions: Sit on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat
Lean back slightly and lift your feet off the ground, balancing on your tailbone
Clasp your hands together and twist your torso to the right, bringing your hands towards the floor beside your hip
Then, twist to the left side
Continue alternating sides for 10-15 repetitions on each side

95451849-0a4e-4133-9fe0-97e88c613787.title: Mountain Climbers
directions: Start in a plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line
Engage your core muscles and bring your right knee towards your chest, then quickly switch legs, bringing your left knee towards your chest while extending your right leg back
Continue alternating legs at a quick pace, as if you're running in place, for 30-60 seconds

95451849-0a4e-4133-9fe0-97e88c613787.title: Leg Raises
directions: Lie flat on your back with your arms by your sides and palms facing down
Keep your legs straight and lift them off the ground until they are perpendicular to the floor
Slowly lower your legs back down towards the ground without letting them touch the floor, then lift them back up
